title: Jardim (Lino Cassiano)
body: He was born in the parish of Santana and was a medical surgeon from the Medical School of this city. In order to practice medicine freely in Brazil, he defended a thesis before the medical faculty of Rio de Janeiro, publishing his dissertation under the title *Da Febre Biliosa.*. Rio de Janeiro, 1871.

Santana: Locality on the Island of Madeira

1871: Defense of the thesis before the medical faculty of Rio de Janeiro
